about_the_game:
New Fools have bubbled up from the crushing depths. Expand your crew choices with the Deep Sea Duo.

Angus: Has a bright future, but a dark past. Their Heirloom, Blinding Lure, reduces reflected projectile damage, but adds pierce and homing on perfect timing.

Jules: Thrives under pressure. Their Heirloom, Collector's Magnet, lets you scavenge a random trinket upon defeating a domain's ruler.
detailed_description:
New Fools have bubbled up from the crushing depths. Expand your crew choices with the Deep Sea Duo.

Angus: Has a bright future, but a dark past. Their Heirloom, Blinding Lure, reduces reflected projectile damage, but adds pierce and homing on perfect timing.

Jules: Thrives under pressure. Their Heirloom, Collector's Magnet, lets you scavenge a random trinket upon defeating a domain's ruler.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300, 2.8 GHzor AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT, 512 MBor AMD Radeon HD 6570, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p @ 30 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHzorAMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660Ti, 2 GBorAMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p @ 60 FPS

short_description: Open the Great Lighthouse and face endgame challenges plus new quests, items encounters and more!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
